v8:item.v8:content: Group balances price kinds price as text
Group balances price kinds price as text
Group balances price kinds price as text main
The price types are not specified group
The price types are not specified group
The price types are not specified.

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT ProductsAndServicesList.Ref AS ProductsAndServices, ProductsAndServicesList.Code AS Code, ProductsAndServicesList.SKU AS SKU, ProductsAndServicesList.Description AS Description, ProductsAndServicesList.MeasurementUnit AS MeasurementUnit, ProductsAndServicesList.UseCharacteristics AS UseCharacteristics, ProductsAndServicesList.UseBatches AS UseBatches, 0 AS Balance, 0 AS Reserve, 0 AS AvailableBalance, 0 AS PriceByClassifier, 0 AS Price, NULL AS PriceIncludesVAT FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS ProductsAndServicesList WHERE (&Group = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServices.EmptyRef) OR ProductsAndServicesList.Ref IN HIERARCHY (&Group)) AND ProductsAndServicesList.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType)
GROUP BY ProductsAndServicesList.Ref, ProductsAndServicesList.Code, ProductsAndServicesList.SKU, ProductsAndServicesList.Description, ProductsAndServicesList.MeasurementUnit, ProductsAndServicesList.UseCharacteristics, ProductsAndServicesList.UseBatches, 0, 0

SELECT CatalogProductsAndServices.Description AS GroupItem, CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServicesRef FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS CatalogProductsAndServices WHERE CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder

SELECT ListProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServices, Characteristics.Description AS Characteristic, Batches.Description AS Batch, ISNULL(Characteristics.Ref, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS CharacteristicRef, ISNULL(Batches.BatchRef, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesBatches.EmptyRef)) AS BatchRef, 0 AS Balance, 0 AS Reserve, 0 AS AvailableBalance, 0 AS PriceByClassifier, 0 AS Price, NULL AS PriceIncludesVAT FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS ListProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN (SELECT ProductsAndServicesBatches.Owner AS ProductsAndServices, ProductsAndServicesBatches.Description AS Description, ProductsAndServicesBatches.Ref AS BatchRef FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServicesBatches AS ProductsAndServicesBatches) AS Batches ON ListProductsAndServices.Ref = Batches.ProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN (SELECT ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.Description AS Description, ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.Owner AS ProductsAndServices, ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.Ref AS Ref FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics AS ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics) AS Characteristics ON (ListProductsAndServices.Ref = Characteristics.ProductsAndServices OR ListProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesCategory = Characteristics.ProductsAndServices.Ref) WHERE Not ListProductsAndServices.IsFolder AND (ListProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics OR ListProductsAndServices.UseBatches) AND ListProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType) AND (&Group = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServices.EmptyRef) OR ListProductsAndServices.Ref IN HIERARCHY (&Group))

v8:item.v8:content: Products and services group for selection in dynamic lists
Query result into new document (document kind)
Pricing in various units of measure
Unique identifier of the owner form
Add new rows to the document
With filter by products and services group (recommended)
